Name: Frida's Brow
Ingredients: 15 ml Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Garnish with a dusting of cinnamon powder.
Review: Creamy, sweetened tequila with hints of chocolate.
History: Discovered in 2005 at Velvet Margarita Cantina in Los Angeles, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Frida's Brow contains 236 calories
